name: mischaracterization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of describing a situation, event, or person wrongly : This is a complete mischaracterisation of the science. This interpretation was a mischaracterisation of the conversation. A great deal was made of the role of mischaracterizations. This is yet another example of mis-characterisation. Related words
characterization (QUALITY)
mischaracterize
More examplesFewer examplesThe story was said to be full of half-truths, gross mischaracterizations, and lies.
